changes.comment: Renames: ItemValuePath->ContentValuePath, visitorPathToString->contentValuePathToString, createRichTextRootNode->createRichText, ItemTraverse* to ContentTraverse*, traverseItemField -> traverseContentField, excludeOmitted->excludeOmittedEntityFields in normalizeEntityFields(), normalizeFieldValue->normalizeContentField. Introduce transformEntityFields/ValueItem. Add more validation.
